New Records: Suryakumar Yadav hit a half-century in his first match as India's permanent T20I captain
India scored 213 runs in the match
Key Match Events: Shubman Gill and Yashasvi Jaiswal's aggressive opening partnership
Pathum Nissanka and Kusal Perera's strong partnership
Double-strike dismissals leading to Sri Lanka's collapse
Pre-Game Insights: Shubman Gill acknowledged the need to improve his T20I batting before the match
Post-Match Reflections: India's ability to defend a large total despite losing key players
Suryakumar Yadav's performance and bowling efforts highlighted
